page.title: 07A PRIMARY SCHOOL DAY
page.content: My School Day by Lisa Meacher. 8-7-85 9.00, the bell rings and I go to my classroom and Mr. Whittingham takes the register. Today we are going to the Music Festival at the Queens School with our choir teacher Mrs. Waling. We arrived back at school at 11.30a.m. in time for our dinner at 12.00 noon. At l2.45p.m. we finished our dinner and went out to play.The bell rang at 1.l5p.m. for us to go back into the classroom.At l.20p.m. Mrs. Malpass came in and I went to do some Domesday work.Afternoon playtime is from 2.l5p.m.-2.30p.m.and for the last hour we get on with some classwork. At 3.30p.m. the bell rings for end of school and I wait for my brother and sister to come out and we walk home together.
